headline: 3 Healthcare Stocks We Steer Clear Of
summary: From novel pharmaceuticals to telemedicine, most healthcare companies are on a mission to drive better patient outcomes. Those leading the charge have not only realized strong financial performance but also propelled the broader industry’s returns as healthcare stocks have gained 14.5% over the past six months while the S&P 500 was up 11.5%.
